about_the_game:
Prison Survival: Architect of Crime Simulator is a sequel to the warmly received Prison Simulator, but with an unusual twist - you're no longer a prison guard. You are the prisoner!
Life in prison as a guard is hard, but as a prisoner - it's a whole different story.
Want to make money? Want a weapon? Want respect? Earn it - steal, make drugs, sell them, make deals with the guards, help with the prison tasks - whatever suits you, prepare for hardships you have never seen before!

Features:


-Craft your own drugs, smuggle and sell them, trade with various characters and make your own network of business partners.



-Get into various prisoner chores: work in the workshop, sort the packages, cook in the kitchen, clean the rooms and don't forget about the toilets! But in the meantime you can expand your business!



-Prisoners have lots of free time on their hands - try to learn something, meet the right people, make friends, who will help you at the toughest of times, and enemies, who will make your life miserable.



-Make a deals with the guards or join the gang! You need this to survive!



-Get a cool unique tattoos! Stylish!



-Free the prisoners, bribe the guards, start a riot, overwhelm the other gangs and build your own prison empire!
Let the others fear you, as the King of the Prison!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / AMD R9-380

You are the prisoner! Steal, sell drugs make deals with the guards, - whatever suits you, prepare for hardships you have never seen before!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Romanian, Ukrainian, Hungarian
